overview: For as long Eli Luberoff can remember, he’s been an informal tutor helping friends and family with homework. Back in his hometown of Amherst, Mass, he remembers occasionally doing his brother’s math homework in elementary school in return for a ride to KFC. His motivation (aside from food) has always been a love for teaching. He started tutoring professionally in high school, and has been a volunteer/peer/professional tutor ever since.
